snippet: The police video of Dharun Ravi’s interrogation was made the night after his roommate at Rutgers University, Tyler Clementi, committed suicide.
abstract: Jurors in the trial of former Rutgers University student Dharun Ravi watch a video of the defendant in which he admits to police that he posted a Web feed of roommate Tyler Clementi in an intimate encounter with another man; Clementi subsequently committed suicide and Ravi faces charges including bias intimidation, invasion of privacy and destruction of evidence.
lead_paragraph: The police video of Dharun Ravi’s interrogation was made the night after his roommate at Rutgers University, Tyler Clementi, committed suicide.

headline.seo: Jury Hears Rutgers Student Admit Posting on Roommate
headline.main: In Video, Jury Hears Student Admit Posting on Roommate
headline.print_headline: In Video, Jury Hears Student Admit Posting On Roommate
